definition: snow lotus herb/Saussurea involucrata
snow/snowfall/CL:場|场[chang2]/to have the appearance of snow/to wipe away, off or out/to clean
surname Xue
lotus

sentences.english: Tibet snow lotus flower has the glorious history as the medicine.
sentences.chinese: 藏醫藏藥上藏雪蓮花作爲藥物已有悠久的歷史。

sentences.english: In this study, yacon leaves were used as raw material to extract polyphenols.
sentences.chinese: 以雪蓮果葉爲原料，採用醇提方法提取其多酚物質。

sentences.english: Different conditions for the inducement of calli and tissue culture in S. involucrata were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 以不同條件研究了雪蓮花愈傷組織誘導及培養。

sentences.english: Objective objective To investigate the anti-inflammatory and analgesic effect of TibetanSaussurea Involucrate.
sentences.chinese: 目的驗證唐古特雪蓮的抗炎鎮痛作用。

sentences.english: In this episode, we had invited Leung Suet Lin (P. 6) and Chan Sze Ting (S. 2) to greet us for the new year.
sentences.chinese: 今集請到梁雪蓮同學和陳思婷同學向大家拜年。

sentences.english: Snow lotus and snow cock belong to the national 2nd category protective animals with high value of medical function.
sentences.chinese: 雪蓮雪雞爲國家二級保護動植物，其藥用價值極高。

sentences.english: Effect of the plant hormones and active carbon on rooting of in vitro shoot of saussurea involucrata kar. et kir.
sentences.chinese: 植物激素和活性炭對新疆雪蓮組培苗生根的影響。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To compare the contents of total flavone between artificial cultivated and wild Saussurea involucrata Kar. et Kir.
sentences.chinese: 目的比較野生與種植雪蓮花的總黃酮含量。

sentences.english: Snow Lotus this song is one of my dance.
sentences.chinese: 雪蓮花這首歌是我的舞曲之一。

sentences.english: Yacon leaf drying after processing, can play a role in lowering blood lipids.
sentences.chinese: 雪蓮果乾燥葉經加工後，能起到降低血脂的作用。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The improvement of the nutrient condition in soil resulted in a increase of total flavone contained in S. involucrata .
sentences.chinese: 結果種植雪蓮花的總黃酮含量明顯高於野生雪蓮花。

sentences.english: CONCLUSION The improvement of the nutrient condition in soil resulted in a increase of total flavone contained in S. involucrata .
sentences.chinese: 結果種植雪蓮花的總黃酮含量明顯高於野生雪蓮花。

sentences.english: Plus the Lotus from Tin Shan.
sentences.chinese: 加上天山雪蓮配製而成。

sentences.english: Xinjiang Snowlotus Uyger Medicine Biological Engineering Co. , Ltd.
sentences.chinese: 新疆雪蓮維藥生物工程有限公司。

sentences.english: What does yacon tuber taste like?
sentences.chinese: 究竟亞貢雪蓮果的果實是什麼味道的呢？

sentences.english: She says she enjoys planting smaller ones like snowdrop bulbs.
sentences.chinese: 她表示自己喜歡種植雪蓮等較小的鱗莖植物。

definition: clear as ice and clean as jade (idiom); spotless/irreproachable/incorruptible
lit. hiding the moon, shaming the flowers (idiom)/fig. female beauty exceeding even that of the natural world
to miss/to yearn day and night
Garden of Many Flowers (name)/Baihua garden in Hongmiao village 洪廟村|洪庙村[Hong2 miao4 cun1], Shandong
gentle and refined
evening mist/fig. declining spirits/lethargy
lady's chamber
Helan Mountains, lying across part of the border between Ningxia and Inner Mongolia
Yushu Tibetan autonomous prefecture (Tibetan: yus hru'u bod rigs rang skyong khul) in Qinghai
(bird species of China) grey heron (Ardea cinerea)
resentful/humiliated and angry
untainted by even a speck of dust (idiom); selfless and incorruptible/spotless
to cross (a road, an ocean etc)/to cut across
to have bright eyes and white teeth
fig. beautiful purples and brilliant reds (idiom); lit. beautiful flowers
township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
